title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Big Bear Lake, California
content:
Photo submitted by Jeff Sayegh, “This shot was taken on the Cabin 89 trail on the south shore of Big Bear Lake.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a

author: Kristi Benedict
